name: Organic Heavy Weight Quilted Blanket in Pink, Gold and Grey Floral - 36 x 42
description:
Affordable organic blanket to swaddle, comfort and play with your little one. My blankets are constructed of all certified organic materials. No need to read through the lines and wonder if organic means all materials, yes my blankets are constructed of all certified organic fabrics. Designers are finally coming out with affordable, colorful alternatives for the eco-conscious family. The colorful cottons that highlight my blankets are complemented with high quality warm European Flannel that is creamy in color and the softest/silkiest you will ever feel. Perfect for those special ones in our life.

This heavy weight quilt is for those chilly days where you really need to wrap that little one up. Colorful organic cottons are on top and bottom with organic batting sandwiched in the middle to trap pockets of warm air to keep the warmth in. Quilting is not done to tightly so that it maximizes the heat kept close to the baby.

Made in my environmentally friendly studio.

Please convo me for other sizes.

Internationaly rates available upon request.

Fabrics have been pre-washed and are completely wash and dryable.

Allow 2 weeks for delivery.

name: Tweetie Bird Quilt 40 x 45
description:
Darling little tweetie bird is highlighted in this primary colored quilt. Fabrics are high quality quilting cottons sewn together with a meandering quilting stitch pattern. I used black thread to add more interest. Binding was sewn onto the quilt and hand finishid for a crisp custom designer finish. The backing is a black minky dot fabric. 

If you would like to add a personal message on a square/or back of this quilt just convo me.

Allow 2 weeks for delivery.

Size: 40" x 45" 

Made in my environmentally friendly studio. 

Convo me for international rates.

name: Seahorse and Octopus Quilt
description:
Seahorses and octopus are all over this little quilt. The colors are peach, aqua, orange. The quilt is perfect for a toddler, baby stroller, lap quilt, etc., or go a little bigger and have one made for yourself. The quilt is sewn together with a small meandering stitch and backed with more orange octopus'. Binding is hand finshed for that crisp designer finish.

It is just adorable! 

Fabrics may vary, but I do my best to match.

If you would like to add a personal message on a square just convo me.

Size 36" x 36"

Allow 2 weeks for delivery.

Sewn in my environmentally friendly studio.

Convo me for international shipping rates...

name: Purple and Lavendar Passion Batik Quilt 56 x 76
description:
For those who love anything purple, this is the quilt for you. The quilt is made from 4 different shades of purple batik fabrics, from an almost black/purple to a light lavender. It is stunning when opened completely out. The size is 56" x 76". It is great as a throw, bed topper, end of bed quilt, snuggle blanky, picnic quilt, TV quilt, gift for a loved one, etc.

Allow 2 weeks for delivery.

If you are interested in this quilt in a different size or color combination please convo me.

The binding has been hand finished.

Made in my envitonmentally friendly shop.

Please convo me for international shipping rates.

name: Shabby Chic Quilt 48 x 57
description:
Here is one of my favorite quilts. This quilt is made from sherbert colors/aka: shabby chic. It is perfect for draping over a sofa, nippy summer evenings out by the fire or at the beach. This is a machine pieced and quilted blanket. The binding is hand sewn. All materials are of the highest quality quilty fabrics. I hope you love this cozy quilt as much as I do.

Allow 2 weeks for shipping..

-size 48" x 57"
-made of 100% cotton fabric and batting
-machine wash cold; tumble dry low 
-pieced and quilted in a smoke and pesticide free environment

OTHER COLORS AND SIZES AVAILABLE:
Cotton Candy Pink
Heavenly Blue
Very Vintage Green

Quilt shown on model is king size.

If you would like to add a personal message on a square of this quilt go to my shop and purchase the link labeled Custom Embroidery Add-On and attach your message. You can always convo me with any questions.

International rates available upon request.
